circles.subject: Students
circles.flyout: We have reached 19,000+ students, within 90+ schools and 16 School Districts. More than half of the school children in Illinois now qualify as low-income students and some of the schools our authorsâ€™ visit have as high as 99 percent low income student populations. By bringing authors to the schools, we give entire student populations the opportunity to meet famous authors and share in their love of literature, which is inspiring for all.

circles.subject: Authors
circles.flyout: 61 authors have visited our Festival since 2008. These authors have received a combined total of over 275 awards and special recognitions for their published works.

circles.subject: Community
circles.flyout: 120+ Community Members, Local Business, and Organizations from our community and hundreds of volunteers have supported the Festival and the Community Day Celebration since 2008.
